attributes.action: Ignore the increasing number of pressure and interest groups that make so many ludicrous demands for special treatment in the same way that the Prime Minister appears to ignore petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is an increasing number of groups and think tanks making an interminable list of demands and calls for new legislation aimed at appeasing or promoting a pet religion,lifestyle, sexual orientation,ethnic group, etc. The common theme appears to be that these groups feel that they merit special treatment or protection. The only real use of a petition system like this one is to make interests and rights groups irrelevant. So why do they still exist to make their demands?
